organization.fullName: The Affiliated Hospital of Xuzhou Medical University

identificationModule.briefTitle: Effect of Remote Ischemic Postcondioning on Glymphatic System in Acute Stroke
identificationModule.officialTitle: Effect of Remote Ischemic Postcondioning on Glymphatic System in Acute Ischemic Stroke

leadSponsor.name: The Affiliated Hospital of Xuzhou Medical University

descriptionModule.briefSummary: Investigators aimed to investigate the changes of glymphatic function after remote ischemic postcondioning treatment in acute ischemic stroke .

armGroups.label: standard therapy
armGroups.description: Patients will be treated with Guideline standard

armGroups.label: remote ischemic postcondioning and standard therapy
armGroups.description: Patients will be treated with remote ischemic postcondioning and Guideline standard , remote ischemic postcondioning twice a day for a total of 3 days.

interventions.name: remote ischemic postcondioning
interventions.description: remote ischemic postcondioning twice daily, for three consecutive days，the upper arm of the lighter paralyzed side was pressurized to 200mmHg, pressurized 5min and relaxed for 5 minutes for 4 cycles as a complete remote ischemic postcondioning
armGroupLabels: remote ischemic postcondioning and standard therapy

interventions.name: standard therapy
armGroupLabels: remote ischemic postcondioning and standard therapy

primaryOutcomes.description: The size of the vascular spaces was assessed by brain magnetic resonance of ischemic postcondioning group and standard therapy group

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Differential expression pattern of differential proteins
secondaryOutcomes.description: Differential expression pattern of differential proteins in blood of patients with remote ischemic postcondioning group and standard therapy group
